subject: History
title: The Discovery of Tutankhamun's Tomb
description: A quick, practical guide to The Discovery of Tutankhamun's Tomb.

hook.text: By 1922, everyone had given up on the Valley of the Kings. Howard Carter hadn't.

buildup.text: Lord Carnarvon funded one last season. On November 4, a water boy tripped over a stone step.

discovery.text: Behind a sealed door lay the only unlooted pharaoh's tomb ever foundâ€”3,000 years untouched.

twist.text: Tutankhamun was a minor king who died at 19. His tomb survived because history forgot him.

climax.text: The gold death mask became the most famous artifact on Earth. King Tut became a global icon.

punchline.text: The most obscure pharaoh became the most famous.

quiz.question: Why was Tutankhamun's tomb the only unlooted royal tomb found?
options: It was protected by an ancient curse
It was forgotten because he was a minor king
It was hidden inside another pharaoh's tomb
